question: bisakah kamu memberi salah satu cerita yang menarik, untuk story telling dalam bahasa inggris? berikan ceritanya

answers.answer: GOLDEN EGGS Long time ago a remote village, in central China was inhabited mainly with farmers and hunters. One day, a poor farmer lost his entire live stock to flood. He prayed hard to God for help or his family would die of starvation. Few days later, an old man with long grey beard, passed by his house took pity on him. He gave him a goose and said “i don’t have any expensive thing to give you and hope this goose will help you to ease your hardship.” A week lter to almost surprise the farmer found an egg in his yard. This was no ordinary egg. It was a golden egg. He was suddenly over come with joy. Thereafter, his livelihood had rapidly improved but the farmer had forgotten his earlier hardship. He became lazy, arrogant and spendthrift. Strangely, the goose only laid one golden egg every six months. The greedy farmer lost his patient and slaughtered his goose thinking there were plenty of golden eggs insideits stomach. Though he very much regretted for his foolishness, its already too late.

GOLDEN EGGS Long time ago a remote village, in central China was inhabited mainly with farmers and hunters. One day, a poor farmer lost his entire live stock to flood. He prayed hard to God for help or his family would die of starvation. Few days later, an old man with long grey beard, passed by his house took pity on him. He gave him a goose and said “i don’t have any expensive thing to give you and hope this goose will help you to ease your hardship.” A week lter to almost surprise the farmer found an egg in his yard. This was no ordinary egg. It was a golden egg. He was suddenly over come with joy. Thereafter, his livelihood had rapidly improved but the farmer had forgotten his earlier hardship. He became lazy, arrogant and spendthrift. Strangely, the goose only laid one golden egg every six months. The greedy farmer lost his patient and slaughtered his goose thinking there were plenty of golden eggs insideits stomach. Though he very much regretted for his foolishness, its already too late.

related_questions.question:
Pada saat lagu Call Me Maybe milik Charly Rae Jepsen, ada lirik: "Before You Came Into My Life"    kenapa menggunakan Came, bukan Come??
padahal kan itu artinya belum terjadi dan tidak bisa menggunakan Past Tense??

answers.answer: karna itu masa lampau jd pake camen came verb brp?

Lirik itu bentuk past tense, cara melihat kalimat itu tenses apa ada 2 cara yaitu: keterangan waktu & kata kerjanya. Lirik itu termasuk dalam recount text. Si penyanyi menyanyikan lagu tentang masa lalunya.

Come adalah kata kerja tidak beraturan (irregular verbs). Bentuk kata kerja keduanya adalah came.


semoga bisa membantu ^_^,,,
maaf jika ada yang salah ^_^,,,
jika ada yang tidak dimengerti dari jawaban di atas, silahkan ditanyakan ^_^,,,

related_questions.question:
Deskripsikan hewan berikut dalam bhs inggris:
1.gross hotper
2.rabbit
3.bird
4.fish

answers.answer:
fish 
fish is any member of a paraphyletic group of organisms. they can swim with their fins. their fins contain proten. 
bird
bird is a group of fly animal. most of them can fly, even though some can't.
Grasshopper : Locust is one insect herbivores. Grasshopper has a characteristic that is, having three pairs of legs, an arthropod animals, and generally winged.

related_questions.question:
There are 11 players on each team in .......... Everyone wears white. It is very popular in England.    a. Baseball
b. Cricket
c. Volleyball
d. Cycling

answers.answer:
simple past tense adalah aturan yang digunakan untuk membuat pernyatan kegiatan yang sudah terlampaui
ct: i slept 2 hours ago ( aku tidur 2 jam yang lalu)

simple past tense adalah kalimat yang menyatakan kejadian yang lalu atau kejadian yang lampau. seperti (yesterday, last two days, last year) atau periode waktunya (for two months, for a day, for an hour).

related_questions.question: Tolong dong buatin monologue berbahasa inggris tentang museum , pake opening sama closing juga .. :D

answers.answer: Hi all, today I would like to share with all of you why I really in love with Museum, Why do I love with it? First, Museum keeps all the civilization history of human being, from thousand years ago. When I went to my first museum, namely Louvre in Paris, I felt like I walked from 5000 years ago to recent moment. Second, Museum teach us how to be wise, it is due to the ability of Museum in conveying the story about war and its wisdom behind it. After all I recommend you to go to museum as often as possible.

related_questions.question:
Tlong dong artiin    the golden compass
lyra belaqua,and her daemon pantalaimon,had lived as an orphan in jordan collage for years. her only relative was her uncle, lord asriel. he was a scientist and an adventurer,and was busy doing his experiment in north pole. therefore, lyra was taken care by the professors and scholars of jordan collage because she had no other place to go. one day lyra overhead the conversation between her uncle and the college senate. it was an extraordinary conversation about a microsco-pic particle,called dust. this particle was said to unite different worlds, and was feared by many who want to destroy it forever. it was what lord asriel experimenting in the north. at the time, she did not know that this conversation would drag her into a dangerous adventure of her faith. soon after that,her uncle was reported missing in the north. and lyra had to leave jordan college to live under the care of a woman named mrs.coulter. at the beginning,she liked her new life,and learned many things as a young girl.

answers.answer: kompas emaslyra Belaqua , dan Pantalaimon daemon nya , telah hidup sebagai yatim piatu di jordan kolase selama bertahun-tahun . hanya relatif nya pamannya , Lord Asriel . dia adalah seorang ilmuwan dan seorang petualang , dan sedang sibuk melakukan percobaan di kutub utara . Oleh karena itu , lyra adalah diurus oleh profesor dan sarjana dari jordan kolase karena dia tidak punya tempat lain untuk pergi . satu hari lyra overhead percakapan antara pamannya dan senat perguruan tinggi. itu adalah percakapan yang luar biasa tentang partikel microsco - pic , yang disebut debu . partikel ini dikatakan untuk menyatukan dunia yang berbeda, dan ditakuti oleh banyak orang yang ingin menghancurkannya selamanya . itu adalah apa yang Lord Asriel bereksperimen di utara . pada saat itu , dia tidak tahu bahwa percakapan ini akan menyeretnya ke dalam petualangan berbahaya imannya . segera setelah itu , pamannya dilaporkan hilang di utara . dan lyra harus meninggalkan jordan perguruan tinggi untuk hidup di bawah perawatan seorang wanita bernama mrs.coulter . di awal , dia menyukai kehidupan barunya , dan belajar banyak hal sebagai gadis muda .

Kompas emas
Lyra belaqua, dan pantalaimon daemon nya, telah hidup sebagai seorang yatim piatu di Yordania kolase selama bertahun-tahun. Ia hidup hanya bersama pamannya, Tuhan asriel. Ia adalah seorang ilmuwan dan seorang petualang yang sibuk melakukan eksperimen di Kutub Utara. oleh karena itu, Lyra adalah diurus oleh para profesor dan sarjana Yordania kolase karena dia tidak ada tempat lain untuk pergi. Suatu hari Lyra mendengar percakapan antara pamannya dan Senat perguruan tinggi. Percakapan itu sangat luar biasa percakapan tentang partikel microsco-pic, disebut debu. Partikel ini dikatakan untuk menyatukan dunia yang berbeda, dan ditakuti oleh banyak orang yang ingin menjadi penghancur selamanya. Itu membuat Tuhan asriel  bereksperimen di Utara. Pada waktu itu, ia tidak tahu bahwa percakapan ini akan menyeret dirinya ke dalam petualangan yang membahayakan imannya. Setelah itu pamannya dilaporkan hilang di utara. Dan lyra harus meninggalkan yordan perguruan tinggi untuk hidup di bawah perawatan seorang wanita bernama mrs.coulter. Di awal kehidupanny, dia menyukainya kehidupan baru, dan belajar banyak hal seperti seorang gadis muda.

related_questions.question:
Fill in the blanks with the past tense of the verbs
we not take our passports

answers.answer:
we didn't take our passports?

we not took our passports

rumus : s + did + not + v1 + o
we didn't take our passports / we did not take our passports
